comment: Do you get it now, white girls? You're not allowed to think for yourself. You are required by coercive measures to think and act as you are told. Otherwise, you are bad. But guess what? You're always going to be the evil scapegoat. No matter how hard you virtue signal, no matter how many black guys you date, the end game is your genocide. You better wake the fuck up.
